verses.verse: Give ear <S%H238><s%> to my words, <S%H561><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Consider <S%H995><s%> my meditation. <S%H1901><s%>
Listen <S%H7181><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my cry, <S%H7773><s%> my King <S%H4428><s%> and my God; <S%H430><s%> for to you do I pray. <S%H6419><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%> In the morning <S%H1242><s%> I will lay <S%H6186><s%> my requests before you, <S%H6822><s%> and will watch expectantly.
For you are not a God <S%H410><s%> who has pleasure <S%H2655><s%> in wickedness. <S%H7562><s%> Evil <S%H7451><s%> can't <S%H1481><s%> live with you.
The arrogant <S%H1984><s%> shall not stand <S%H3320><s%> in your sight. <S%H5869><s%> You hate <S%H8130><s%> all workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity. <S%H205><s%>
You will destroy <S%H6><s%> those who speak <S%H1696><s%> lies. <S%H3577><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> abhors <S%H8581><s%> the bloodthirsty <S%H1818><s%> and deceitful <S%H4820><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

But as for me, <S%H7230><s%> in the abundance of your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> I will come <S%H935><s%> into your house. <S%H1004><s%> I will bow <S%H7812><s%> toward your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%> in reverence of you. <S%H3374><s%>
Lead <S%H5148><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, in your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> because of my enemies. <S%H8324><s%> Make your way <S%H1870><s%> straight <S%H3474><s%> before my face. <S%H6440><s%>

For there is no faithfulness <S%H3559><s%> in their mouth. <S%H6310><s%> Their heart <S%H7130><s%> is destruction. <S%H1942><s%> Their throat <S%H1627><s%> is an open <S%H6605><s%> tomb. <S%H6913><s%> They flatter <S%H2505><s%> with their tongue. <S%H3956><s%>

Hold them guilty, <S%H816><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> Let them fall <S%H5307><s%> by their own counsels; <S%H4156><s%> Thrust them out <S%H5080><s%> in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of their transgressions, <S%H6588><s%> for they have rebelled against you. <S%H4784><s%>

But let all those who take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in you rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> Let them always <S%H5769><s%> shout for joy, <S%H7442><s%> because you defend <S%H5526><s%> them. <S%H157><s%> Let them also who love your name <S%H8034><s%> be joyful in you. <S%H5970><s%>
For you will bless <S%H1288><s%> the righteous. <S%H6662><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you will surround <S%H5849><s%> him with favor <S%H7522><s%> as with a shield. <S%H6793><s%>
